name: Kabitis (itch)
description:
Dron was sent to kidnap people, however, Kabitis and Aike managed to escape. Now, they decide to rescue these people.

2D side platform game that offers:
Play for one or two players.
Accumulate points by defeating enemies and become more resilient.
Automatic data saving.
Fighting minigame for two players (unlockable)
Unlockable collectible cards.
Different areas like mountain, beach and forest with a total of more than 20 stages.
Collect red crystals to enter special stages.
Collect blue crystals to exchange for items.

Items has useful functions such as:
New platform, use it to reach hard to reach places.
Life, guarantees you new attempts.
Juices, restore your health.
Time, buy or sell time, the phases have timers.
Bees, Crissa helps to collect blue crystals. Brigia strikes anyone, be careful.
Manual with lots of useful information.

With all these functions you can complete the stages in the way you want, is in your hands. Also, the game as more to show than was mentioned above, so enjoy it.
